product_name: REI Micro Fleece Long-Underwear Crew Shirt - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Offering next-to-skin warmth and softness, the REI Micro Fleece women's long-underwear crew shirt keeps you warm from the inside out during cold-weather activities such as skiing or snowshoeing. Lightweight, quick-dry polyester micro fleece insulates while remaining breathable; long-underwear top can be worn alone on mild days. Fabric features built-in UPF 50+ sun protection. Special buy.
